description: This cluster provides attributes and events for determining basic information about Nodes, which supports both Commissioning and operational determination of Node characteristics, such as Ven­ dor ID, Product ID and serial number, which apply to the whole Node.

0x0000.name: DataMod­
0x0000.details: uint16 desc F MS RV M
0x0000.raw_line: 0x0000         DataMod­       uint16        desc           F              MS             RV          M

0x0001.name: Vendor­
0x0001.details: string max 32 F MS RV M
0x0001.raw_line: 0x0001         Vendor­        string        max 32         F              MS             RV          M

0x0002.name: VendorID
0x0002.details: vendor-id all F MS RV M
0x0002.raw_line: 0x0002         VendorID       vendor-id     all            F              MS             RV          M

0x0003.name: Product­
0x0003.details: string max 32 F MS RV M
0x0003.raw_line: 0x0003         Product­       string        max 32         F              MS             RV          M

0x0004.name: ProductID
0x0004.details: uint16 all F MS RV M
0x0004.raw_line: 0x0004         ProductID uint16             all            F              MS             RV          M

0x0005.name: NodeLabel
0x0005.details: string max 32 N "" RW VM M
0x0005.raw_line: 0x0005         NodeLabel string             max 32         N              ""             RW VM       M

0x0006.name: Location
0x0006.raw_line: 0x0006         Location       string        2              N              "XX"           RW VA       M

0x0007.name: Hardware­
0x0007.raw_line: 0x0007         Hardware­ uint16             all            F              0              RV          M

0x0008.name: Hardware­
0x0008.details: string 1 to 64 F MS RV M
0x0008.raw_line: 0x0008         Hardware­ string             1 to 64        F              MS             RV          M

0x0009.name: Software­
0x0009.raw_line: 0x0009         Software­       uint32        desc           F              0              RV          M

0x000A.name: Software­
0x000A.details: string 1 to 64 F MS RV M
0x000A.raw_line: 0x000A         Software­       string        1 to 64        F              MS             RV          M

0x000B.name: Manufac­
0x000B.details: string 8 to 16 F MS RV O
0x000B.raw_line: 0x000B         Manufac­        string        8 to 16        F              MS             RV          O

0x000C.name: PartNum­
0x000C.details: string max 32 F MS RV O
0x000C.raw_line: 0x000C         PartNum­        string        max 32         F              MS             RV          O

0x000D.name: Produc­
0x000D.details: string max 256 F MS RV O
0x000D.raw_line: 0x000D         Produc­         string        max 256        F              MS             RV          O

0x000E.name: Product­
0x000E.details: string max 64 F MS RV O
0x000E.raw_line: 0x000E         Product­        string        max 64         F              MS             RV          O

0x000F.name: Serial­
0x000F.details: string max 32 F MS RV O
0x000F.raw_line: 0x000F         Serial­         string        max 32         F              MS             RV          O

0x0010.name: LocalCon­
0x0010.details: bool all N False RW VM O
0x0010.raw_line: 0x0010         LocalCon­ bool                all            N              False          RW VM       O

0x0011.name: Reachable
0x0011.raw_line: 0x0011         Reachable bool                all                           True           RV          O

0x0012.name: UniqueID
0x0012.details: string max 32 F MS RV O
0x0012.raw_line: 0x0012         UniqueID        string        max 32         F              MS             RV          O

0x0013.name: Capabili­
0x0013.details: Capabili­ all F MS RV M
0x0013.raw_line: 0x0013         Capabili­       Capabili­     all            F              MS             RV          M

0x0014.name: Produc­
0x0014.details: ProductAp­ all F MS RV O
0x0014.raw_line: 0x0014         Produc­         ProductAp­ all               F              MS             RV          O

0x0015.name: Specifica­
0x0015.raw_line: 0x0015         Specifica­      uint32        desc           F              0              RV          M

0x0016.name: Max­
0x0016.raw_line: 0x0016         Max­            uint16        min 1          F              1              RV          M
